benchmark_details.name: SweWinogender
benchmark_details.overview: SweWinogender is a diagnostic dataset to measure gender bias in coreference resolution, modeled after the English Winogender benchmark.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To measure gender bias in pronoun resolution systems.
tasks: Evaluating gender bias in coreference resolution

methods: Sentence construction based on English Winogender
methodology.calculation: Assessment of bias through model performance on different variants of sentences
methodology.interpretation: Focus on gender-occupation associations and bias detection

targeted_risks.harm: Potential misrepresentation of gender in AI systems.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Data released under an open license, protecting individual identities.
